record.field: 4. Taxable outward supplies made to Registered persons
4A. Including supplies made through e-commerce operator attracting TCS - B2B Regular
4B. Attracting tax on reverse charge - B2B Reverse charge
5. Taxable outward inter-state supplies made to Unregistered persons including supplies made through e-commerce operator
6. Exports / Special economic zone / Deemed exports
6B. Supplies made to SEZ unit or SEZ developer - SEZWP/SEZWOP
Special economic zone with payment - sezwp
Special economic zone without payment - sezwop
7. Taxable supplies to unregistered persons including supplies made through e-commerce operator attracting TCS
8. Nil rated, exempted and non GST outward supplies
For taxable outward supplies in table 4 other than table 6 - B2B Regular
For taxable outward supplies in table 4 other than table 6 - B2B Reverse charge
For taxable outward supplies in table 6B - SEZWP
For taxable outward supplies in table 6B - SEZWOP
For taxable outward supplies in table 6C - DE
14A. ECO liable to deduct TCS u/s 52
14B. ECO liable to pay GST u/s 9(5)
